# KYC, age verification and 1click sign-up

##### Accelerating sales through customer authentication

Create accountTalk to an expert

### 1account's suite of products provide the infrastructure for faster
customer journeys and increased sales, while staying compliant

  * ## KYC and age verification

Grow your customer base and meet industry regulations with our award-winning
age and identity verification platform

  * ## 1click sign-up

Remove barriers to the customer journey and increase your conversion rate with
our frictionless registration solution

  * ## Digital ID

Create seamless customer experiences and leverage verified consumer data with
our trusted digital identity application

## Benefits for your business

1account helps companies in age-restricted industries to grow their business
and comply with legal requirements. We know how tough it is to find reliable
solutions that give tangible results, which is why we've created our award-
winning product suite.

If you don't know who you're selling to, you could be at risk of heavy fines
and damaging your reputation. That's why our easy-to-implement KYC solution
has the highest verification rate on the market, giving you peace of mind that
every customer is validated pre-purchase.

To further support businesses we have also developed 1click sign-up, letting
your customers register to your website in seconds. Less barriers means more
sign-ups and fewer abandoned carts.

Discover our products: KYC/age verification, 1click sign-up and Digital ID.

Create accountTalk to an expert

## Why use 1account?

1account's market-leading verification rate ensures our clients onboard more
customers. This is due to checking against more data sources than any other
KYC provider.

1account also uses its own ever-increasing database of pre-verified customers.
We'll always check against this first to facilitate cheaper look-ups and
faster response times. In addition, each user has an active session created on
the device they used, allowing them to use 1click sign-up.

It's these unique elements that set our products apart from the competition,
and allows us to bring more benefits to both clients and consumers alike.

Create accountTalk to an expert

## See what our clients have to say

Vapeshop collaborated with 1account to aid the refinement of its official app
in the Shopify App store with a view to launching on our other brands, should
everything work as expected.We ran tests throughout the summer and after a
positive uplift in the percentage of verified users compared to other
providers, and a now seamless integration to our backend order fulfilment, we
are excited to launch their solution on our other brand, ECIGWIZARD.

Vapeshop & eCigWizard

Whilst our old age verification system did prevent underage orders, it was
expensive and had a much lower success rate than 1account. 23% lower. The
feedback we have had from our customers who have used the 1account integration
to verify their age has been overwhelmingly positive. We would recommend
1account to any online retailer looking to implement an age verification
process who otherwise wouldn't, due to concerns about any disruption

Royal Flush Vape

Vilosophy and V&YOU face challenges involving regulations, as we operate in
two difficult sectors, Nicotine and CBD. Damian and 1account have provided us
with a solution that initially wasn’t ‘out of the box’, but they have been
quick to fix issues and the service that is provided is very responsive. I
Highly recommend 1account and particularly Damian.

V&YOU & Vilosophy
